info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 2:50PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Iredell and west central Rowan Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 250 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles southeast of Statesville, or near Troutman. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Statesville, Troutman, Lake Norman, Lake Norman State Park, Mooresville, Mount Ulla and Doolie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
